alert_only_one_region_left: Only one segment left. You can not delete it!
config_update_error: An error occured while updating resource options.
config_update_success: Options for the resource successfully updated.
creation_error_wrong_file_format: The given file format is not allowed (mp3 / wav)
delete_region_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this region?
help_modal_help_tab_label: Help available for the selected region
help_modal_intro:
You might have missed the right region.

Here you will be able to choose between the current and previous region (if exists).
You will see the corresponding help (if exists) on the other tab.
identified_region_helps: Below are the helps available for problems you pointed
media_resource_options_explain: At least one view type should be enabled
media_resource_save_regions: Save resource regions and regions options
no_problems_detected_message_first: Congratulations ! You haven't pointed any problem !
no_problems_detected_message_second: If you want to restart please use the button below.
popover_players_active: The student will access set helps when asking
popover_players_free: Help and region are shown as soon as pause is asked. This player can display text transcription.
popover_players_live: The student will be able to listen freely to the document and acces loop & slow helps everywhere
popover_players_pause: The player will automatically pause playback (2s) on each region end
popover_players_scripted: 2 steps playback. First the student will tell each time he encounters a problem. Then he'll get access to the related help
popover_transcription_popover_explain_fi: This field allow you to set the region text transcription
popover_transcription_popover_explain_se: These data will be used by TextToSpeach (i.e. Backward building help) and in the Free player mode
region_config_help_links_placeholder: Add a help link (http://www.mylink.com) or leave empty
region_config_help_texts_placeholder: Add a help text or leave empty
region_delete_confirm_base: Are you sure you want to delete this region?
region_delete_confirm_sub:
This region is related to one or more helps.
Those helps will be automatically deleted.
region_help_no_help_available: No help available for this region.
region_help_preview: Preview planned help for the current region
region_help_segment_playback_backward: Play the region with backward building
resource_update_error: An error occured while updating resource.
scripted_active_explaination_second: If you encounter a comprehension problem press [spacebar] or click the flag button.
scripted_active_explaination_step2_first: You can listen freely to the document.
scripted_active_explaination_step2_secon: Comprehension help is proposed for every identified problem.
